author: Ben Eisen
title: No One Wants to Bet on the End of Volatility
text: Stock-price swings show no sign of abating as the market’s rough patch nears its three-month anniversary. The S&P 500 climbed 1.9% at its high during Monday’s session, marking its 19th intraday gain of at least 1% so far this year. That’s the most for any comparable period since 2009, when major indexes were rebounding from   China Soothes Trade War-Weary Investors—Energy Journal Next Stocks to Watch: Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Exxon Mobil, Boeing, Nvidia, Netflix, VeriFone, Monsanto
